title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, copy, delete models via simple Python calls.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers: same generate/chat/embed API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package: LLM, chat, embeddings and tool-calling wrappers around Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama: markdown, code highlight, model manager, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and tab completion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama: sync/async APIs, Kotlin extensions, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama: supports .NET 6+, Unity, Blazor WebAssembly with async enumerable streams.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM proxy support for Ollama: standardize OpenAI-style calls to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official compose stacks: CPU, GPU (CUDA & ROCm), persistent volumes, and WebUI sidecars.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Open PR adding Ollama backend to Transformers pipelines for easy HF model→Ollama conversion.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands with per-user quotas.

title: ollama-npm-search
summary: npm registry search listing 30+ community packages: SDKs, CLIs, Express middleware, etc.

title: ollama-pypi-search
summary: PyPI search showing 40+ packages: FastAPI wrappers, Django apps, Airflow hooks, LangChain extensions.

title: r/ollama - Model Discussion Thread
summary: Active Reddit thread comparing new Gemma 2 9B vs Llama 3 8B running locally via Ollama.
